name: Feline Isle
description:
Feline Isle is a Video Game About Pink Felines Collecting Crystals To Get Powered Up Before An Epic Battle! Come And Get Your Slap On!

Control Scheme

  • Esc to open in-game menu.

Movement

  • WASD - move
  • Space bar - jump
    • Space bar in-air - double jump
  • Mouse - camera

Attacks

  • Left Mouse Click - Swipe
  • Right Mouse Click - Pounce
